query:
SELECT ct.id, ct.name, COUNT(cti.id) as item_count
FROM checklistTemplates ct
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplateItems cti ON ct.id = cti.templateId
GROUP BY ct.id, ct.name
HAVING item_count > 0
LIMIT 5
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute SELECT ct.id, ct.name, COUNT(cti.id) as item_count
FROM checklistTemplates ct
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplateItems cti ON ct.id = cti.templateId
GROUP BY ct.id, ct.name
HAVING item_count > 0
